abstract: Has Citigroup‘s Charles O. Prince III maneuvered himself into checkmate, or is he in control of the chessboard? Was the mega-bank’s latest management shuffle a bloop single or a fly out?
lead_paragraph: Has Citigroup‘s Charles O. Prince III maneuvered himself into checkmate, or is he in control of the chessboard? Was the mega-bank’s latest management shuffle a bloop single or a fly out?

headline.main: Reading the Post-Game Analysis for Citi
